title: pet peve w/ ele lux
body:
am I the only one that found it extremely annoying whenthe plant popped up in the elementalist lux ability spotlight?

edit: love the skin, guna save up for it and play lux alot more often because of if too

also dark lux it at 19:30 minutes into the video for those who only want to see that

also, also dark lux should make your scene go more and more greyscale the more she damages you before you heals you to 100%
